Sliding Tiles is a puzzle game where you have to arrange the tiles one by one in the correct order and position, over a grid.
To move a tile you just have to press it and, if the tile has an empty space beside it, it will move to that empty space.

There are a certain number of tiles per puzzle, and you have to arrange them starting with placing the Tile 1 in the upper left corner of the grid, then to the right place the Tile 2, then Tile 3 up to the end of the row.
Every row starts with the next Tile of the previous row.
1 2 3
4 5 6
7 8

The game finishes when you arrange all the tiles in the correct order and position.\nSliding Tiles is a challenging puzzle game where you have to arrange the next tiles avoiding moving the ones that are already on position.\nGood luck!
